sentences.sContent: The key for corporate America is to embrace the irritant, while the challenge for innovators is to turn irritation into inspiration.
sentences.sContent_eng: The key for corporate America is to embrace the irritant, while the challenge for innovators is to turn irritation into inspiration.
sentences.sCn: 创新者的挑战在于把刺激物变成灵感，而那些非政府所有制的企业则需要接纳这种刺激物。

words.tran: 刺激的；气人的；使愤怒的
刺激的；刺激性的；使发怒的
激怒；使…无效；使…兴奋（irritate的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: [医] 刺激物，[医] 刺激剂
trans.tranOther: a substance that can make a part of your body painful and sore
